name: Necromantic Heir
summary: Your affinity for negative energy spills outward and grants you a refilling well of necromantic essence.
description:
Your affinity for negative energy spills outward and grants you a refilling well of necromantic essence. Once per hour, you can cast harm as a 6th-level divine innate spell.Traits

Skeleton: This undead is made by animating a dead creatureâ€™s skeleton with negative energy.
